attributes.action: Legislate that organisations be required to offer 01, 02 or 03 contact phone numbers as alternative to 08 numbers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More and more organisations are now only providing chargeable 08 contact phone numbers, which frequently take the caller through numerous options, resulting in extended call and expensive durations.
 
Most mobile phone contracts and many landline phone customers have inclusive calling plans which exclude 08 phone numbers. In legislating that organisations must offer an 01, 02 or 03 contact number as an alternative to 08 numbers, phone customers would have the option to choose which number is best suited to their individual calling plans.
 
To ensure that such alternatives to 08 numbers are readily available, organisations should be required to register these 01, 02, or 03 numbers on an internet-based database.
